thread.title: BRIEF-China Yongda Automobiles Services Expects To Record Increase In Fy2017 Consol Net Profit Attributable

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Yongda Automobiles Services Expects To Record Increase In Fy2017 Consol Net Profit Attributable

organizations.name: china yongda automobiles services holdings ltd

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - China Yongda Automobiles Services Holdings Ltd:
* EXPECTED TO RECORD INCREASE OF MORE THAN 70% IN CONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF CO FOR FY2017
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO STEADY INCREASE IN SALES VOLUME OF NEW VEHICLES AND IMPROVEMENT IN GROSS PROFIT MARGIN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
